characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for friendly DRUKHARI units that are within 6" of the model in the Fight phase. In addition, if a Cronos inflicts one or more wounds in the Fight phase, you can pick a friendly DRUKHARI unit within 6" of the Cronos that is not a VEHICLE. The unit you pick recovers 1 wound lost earlier in the battle.
